title: PHPUnit/Util/Filter raising an "Empty delimiter" warning when mbstring.func_overload is enabled
body:
`strpos` and `mb_strpos` have a little change when dealing with non-string values on `$needle`.

**strpos:**
If needle is not a string, it is converted to an integer and applied as the ordinal value of a character.

**mb_strpos:**
The string to find in haystack. In contrast with strpos(), numeric values are not applied as the ordinal value of a character.

That change makes mb_strpos raise the following warning when `$needle` is `FALSE`:

```
Warning: mb_strpos(): Empty delimiter in /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Util/Filter.php on line 110

Call Stack:
    0.0004     228248   1. {main}() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/composer/bin/phpunit:0
    0.0083     640592   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/composer/bin/phpunit:63
    0.0083     641216   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:129
    0.9888   21913896   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_TestRunner->doRun() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:176
   10.2774   47187456   5. PHPUnit_TextUI_ResultPrinter->printResult() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/TestRunner.php:355
   10.2775   47187880   6. PHPUnit_TextUI_ResultPrinter->printIncompletes() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/ResultPrinter.php:182
   10.2775   47188064   7. PHPUnit_TextUI_ResultPrinter->printDefects() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/ResultPrinter.php:319
   10.3499   47947376   8. PHPUnit_TextUI_ResultPrinter->printDefect() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/ResultPrinter.php:225
   10.3499   47947376   9. PHPUnit_TextUI_ResultPrinter->printDefectTrace() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/ResultPrinter.php:238
   10.3500   47947496  10. PHPUnit_Util_Filter::getFilteredStacktrace() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/TextUI/ResultPrinter.php:274
   10.3504   47951360  11. mb_strpos() /Users/luis/Sites/provinha/vendor/phpunit/phpunit/PHPUnit/Util/Filter.php:110
```

I've tried to change `FALSE` to `0` on Filter.php:68 and it's working but I'm not so sure that is the correct approach to solve this, any ideas?
